newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore bunker final report and prices - Oct 18.
newsitem.headline: Singapore bunker final report and prices - Oct 18.

text.p: DELIVERED U.S.$/TONNE) 380 CST 180 CST MDO GAS OIL

COMMENTS - Singapore bunker levels on Friday ended steady from Thursday, traders said. While enquries were healthy, transacted volumes were limited, a trader at a major said. "Shipowners were just testing the waters," he said. Another independent was heard to have sold to a Japanese shipowner 2,000 tonne of 180-cst supplies at $125.50. MDO and gasoil prices held steady on thin demand.-- Singapore newsoom (65-870-3082).
